extension.codespaces.description: 不受位置限制、由雲端提供支援的智慧生產力與共同作業。
extension.codespaces.welcomeCreateCodesp:
Develop in a cloud-hosted, customizable environment.
[Create Codespace](command:github.codespaces.addEnvironment)
extension.codespaces.welcomeSignIn:
GitHub Codespaces is a paid service that must be enabled for your organization.
Sign in to view your codespaces or [learn more](https://docs.github.com/codespaces/about-codespaces).
[Sign in to GitHub](command:github.codespaces.signIn)
extension.codespaces.defaultExtensions: 要在 VS 程式碼空間中安裝的預設延伸模組
extension.codespaces.usePortForwardingSe: When enabled, HTTPS services will be forwarded through our port forwarding service instead of local TCP server.
extension.codespaces.createCodespaceInNe: When a new codespace is created, open it in a new window.
extension.codespaces.newConnectionFlowDi: Explicitly disable the new resolver flow.
extension.codespaces.connectionTypeMainT: Connection is created on the main thread.
extension.codespaces.connectionTypeWorks: Connection is created on a spearate thread.
extension.codespaces.connectionTypeFaste: Either main or separate thread connection, whichever succeeds first.
extension.codespaces.devContainerChanged: Select which type of notification to show when devcontainer content changes
Standard toast notification when devcontainer changes
Modal dialog notification when devcontainer changes
extension.codespaces.reloadServer: 在主機上終止 VS Code 伺服器...
extension.codespaces.disconnectSuspend: 暫止目前的程式碼空間
extension.codespaces.openInNewWindow: 在新視窗中開啟程式碼空間
extension.codespaces.openInInsiders: 在 VS Code Insiders 中開啟
extension.codespaces.openInStable: 在 VS Code 中開啟
